text: António Guedes de Herédia (10 March 1901 - 13 August 1997) was a sailor from Portugal, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics, 1936 Summer Olympics and the 1948 Summer Olympics. == References == ==Sources== * Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Sailors at the 1936 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 1948 Summer Olympics – Dragon Category:Olympic sailors of Portugal Category:1901 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Portuguese male sailors (sport)
title: António de Herédia
